Parameters.Name: RECORDING-5-1-4 RECORDING CONTROL – TRACK CONFIGURATION EVENT

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-4 Features detection
Test.Name: GetServices and Digest suported
Test.Description: GetServices - supported. Digest - supported.

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-4 RECORDING CONTROL – TRACK CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Hikvision issues
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-4 RECORDING CONTROL – TRACK CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends correct response with one recording job

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-4 RECORDING CONTROL – TRACK CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response: one recording job
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-4 RECORDING CONTROL – TRACK CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends correct response with one recording job

Test.Name: Incorrect notification: invalid UTC-Time

Test.Name: Incorrect notification: no Source.SimpleItem item with Name="RecordingToken"
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-4 RECORDING CONTROL – TRACK CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends Notification without Source.SimpleItem

Test.Name: Incorrect notification: message with not existing RecordingToken

Test.Name: Incorrect notification: message with unexpected TrackToken

Test.Name: Incorrect notification: DUT sends 2 messages

Test.Name: Incorrect notification: no Data.ElementItem item with Name="Configuration"
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-4 RECORDING CONTROL – TRACK CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends Notification without Data.ElementItem item with Name="Configuration"

Test.Name: Incorrect notification: Data.ElementItem with Name="Configuration" use wrong scheme

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-4 RECORDING CONTROL – TRACK CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Data.ElementItem item with Name=«Configuration» differs from TrackConfiguration
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-4 RECORDING CONTROL – TRACK CONFIGURATION EVENT test when Data.ElementItem item with Name=«Configuration» from Notification message has different value with RecordingConfiguration element from GetTrackConfigurationResponse messages for selected Recording

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-4 RECORDING CONTROL – TRACK CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response: The DUT did not send PullMessagesResponse message
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-4 RECORDING CONTROL – TRACK CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT did not send PullMessagesResponse message

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-4 RECORDING CONTROL – TRACK CONFIGURATION EVENT
Test.Name: There is not expected event: no events
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-5-1-4 RECORDING CONTROL – TRACK CONFIGURATION EVENT test when DUT sends PMs responses with no events Check that TT will wait operation delay for catching of event Check for different Operation delay values (10 s, 30 s, 60 s)
